verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Come <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G1223><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Transgress <S%G3845><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tradition <S%G3862><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Elders? <S%G4245><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> They Wash <S%G3538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Their Hands <S%G846><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> They Eat. <S%G2068><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Transgress <S%G3845><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3862><s%> Your Tradition? <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Commanded, <S%G1781><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%>, Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Mother; <S%G3384><s%>, And, <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Speaks Evil Of <S%G2551><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> By Death <S%G2288><s%> Let Him Die. <S%G5053><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Father <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> It Is A Gift <S%G1435><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Thou Mightest Be Profited : <S%G5623><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father <S%G846><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Made Void <S%G208><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tradition <S%G3862><s%> Your. <S%G5216><s%>
Hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Prophesied <S%G4395><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Isaiah, <S%G2268><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Draws Near <S%G1448><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> This People <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With The Lips <S%G5491><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> It Honours; <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2588><s%>, Their Heart <S%G846><s%> Far <S%G4206><s%> Is Away <S%G568><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me : <S%G1700><s%>
<S%G3155><s%> But In Vain <S%G1161><s%> They Worship <S%G4576><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Teaching As <S%G1321><s%> Teachings <S%G1319><s%> Injunctions <S%G1778><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Understand! <S%G4920><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Enters <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Defiles <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man; <S%G444><s%> But <S%G235><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Goes Forth <S%G1607><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth, <S%G4750><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Defiles <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Knowest Thou <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saying <S%G3056><s%> Were Offended? <S%G4624><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Plant <S%G5451><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Has Planted <S%G5452><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly, <S%G3770><s%> Shall Be Rooted Up. <S%G1610><s%>

Leave <S%G863><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> Leaders <S%G3595><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> Of Blind; <S%G5185><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Lead, <S%G3594><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Pit <S%G999><s%> Will Fall. <S%G4098><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Expound <S%G5419><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable. <S%G3778><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Still <S%G188><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Without Understanding <S%G801><s%> Are? <S%G2075><s%>

Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Perceive Ye <S%G3539><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Enters <S%G1531><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Belly <S%G2836><s%> Goes, <S%G5562><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Draught <S%G856><s%> Is Cast Forth? <S%G1544><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The Things Which, <S%G1161><s%> Go Forth <S%G1607><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Come Forth, <S%G1831><s%> And These <S%G2548><s%> Defile <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G1537><s%> For Out Of <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Come Forth <S%G1831><s%> Reasonings <S%G1261><s%> Evil, <S%G4190><s%> Murders, <S%G5408><s%> Adulteries, <S%G3430><s%> Fornications, <S%G4202><s%> Thefts, <S%G2829><s%> False Witnessings, <S%G5577><s%> Blasphemies. <S%G988><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> They Which <S%G3588><s%> Defile <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man; <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The With <S%G1161><s%> Unwashed <S%G449><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Eating <S%G5315><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Defiles Not <S%G2840><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Going Forth <S%G1831><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Withdrew <S%G402><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parts <S%G3313><s%> Of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon; <S%G4605><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Canaan <S%G5478><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3725><s%> Those Borders <S%G1565><s%> Having Come Out <S%G1831><s%> Cried <S%G2905><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Have Pity On <S%G1653><s%>, Me, <S%G3165><s%>, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of David; <S%G1138><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2364><s%> My Daughter <S%G3450><s%> Miserably <S%G2560><s%> Is Possessed By A Demon. <S%G1139><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Answered Not <S%G611><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> A Word. <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Dismiss <S%G630><s%>, Her, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> She Cries <S%G2896><s%> After <S%G3693><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Was Not Sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lost <S%G622><s%> Of The House <S%G3624><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But She <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Help <S%G997><s%> Me! <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> To Take <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Cast It <S%G906><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Little Dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But She <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Lord : <S%G2532><s%> For Even <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Dogs <S%G2952><s%> Eat <S%G2068><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crumbs <S%G5589><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Fall <S%G4098><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Table <S%G5132><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Their Masters. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her, <S%G846><s%> O 5599 INJ Woman, 1135 N-VSF Great Is 3173 A-NSF Thy 4675 P-2GS 3588 T-NSF Faith : 4102 N-NSF Be It 1096 V-AOM-3S To Thee 4671 P-2DS As 5613 ADV Thou Desirest. 2309 V-PAI-2S And 2532 CONJ Was Healed 2390 V-API-3S 3588 T-NSF 2364 N-NSF Her Daughter 846 P-GSF From 575 PREP 3588 T-GSF 5610 N-GSF That Hour. 1565 D-GSF

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Departed <S%G3327><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Towards <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> He Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> '' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G1438><s%>, Lame, <S%G5560><s%>, Blind, <S%G5185><s%>, Dumb, <S%G2974><s%>, Maimed, <S%G2948><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G2087><s%>, Many, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Cast Down <S%G4496><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> At <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Healed <S%G2323><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> Dumb <S%G2974><s%> Speaking, <S%G2980><s%> Maimed <S%G2948><s%> Sound, <S%G5199><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> Walking, <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> Seeing; <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Glorified <S%G1392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> I Am Moved With Compassion <S%G4697><s%> Towards <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> They Continue <S%G4357><s%> With Me, <S%G3427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not <S%G2192><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> They May Eat; <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Send Away <S%G630><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Fasting <S%G3523><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Not Willing, <S%G2309><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> They Faint <S%G1590><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way. <S%G3598><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%>, His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Desert <S%G2047><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> So Many <S%G5118><s%> As <S%G5620><s%> To Satisfy <S%G5526><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> So Great? <S%G5118><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Have Ye? <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Few <S%G3641><s%> Small Fishes. <S%G2485><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Commanded <S%G2753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> To Recline <S%G377><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground; <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fishes, <S%G2486><s%> Having Given Thanks <S%G2168><s%> He Broke <S%G2806><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ate <S%G5315><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Satisfied; <S%G5526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Took Up <S%G142><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Over And Above <S%G4052><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fragments <S%G2801><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Baskets <S%G4711><s%> Full; <S%G4134><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They Who <S%G1161><s%> Ate <S%G2068><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Four Thousand <S%G5070><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> Besides <S%G5565><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Children. <S%G3813><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Dismissed <S%G630><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> He Entered <S%G1684><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G3725><s%> Of Magdala. <S%G3093><s%>
